import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Badge, Card, Button, Form, InputGroup } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Formik } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; import '../style/Checkout.css'; const schema = Yup.object().shape({ name: Yup.string().required('Your name is missing.'), phone: Yup.string().matches(/^\d{8}$/, 'Invalid Phone Number').required('Phone number is missing.'), address: Yup.string() .when('payment', { is: (payment) => payment !== 'Cash', then: Yup.string().required('Shipping address is missing.') }), notes: Yup.string().max(100, "Maximum 100 characters allowed.") }); const initialize = { name: '', phone: '', address: '', payment: 'Cash', cardNumber: '', nameOnCreditCard: '', cvv: '', notes: '', } const CheckoutPage = () => { return ( <>

Checkout form

{ alert(JSON.stringify(values, null, 2)); }} > { ({ values, errors, touched, handleSubmit, handleChange, handleBlur }) => ( <>

Billing address

Name {errors.name} Phone Number +852 {errors.phone} Address {errors.address}

Payment

Cash:
Pickup at store only
Address: Unit 1, 1/F, ABC Building, Hong Kong, N.T.

Bank Transfer:
Please transfer to the account:
Bank Acc.: 000-000-0-000000-0
E-shop Company

Once the transfer completed, please send the capture of transaction record to
Whatsapp: 0000 0000
After we confirm the payment, we will arrange the delivery.
dfsa Notes {100 - values.notes.length >= 0 ? `Remaining Characters: ${100 - values.notes.length}` : `${errors.notes} Current characters: ${values.notes.length}.`}
) }

Your cart 9

    Brief description

) } export default CheckoutPage;
